29th of October 2014

Just got back home from London at Mozilla Festival 2014 [and a little detour by Paris on the way back home]. It was really nice to meet some of my fellows from the Marketplace Team, and to enjoy with a lot of enthusiastic mozillians.
Below are some photos from MozFest, and my little London Tour.
